sentences.en: But in real life young men who hoped for this denouement apt to be disappointed.
sentences.cn: 但是在现实生活里,梦想这种结局的年轻小伙子多半会以失望告终.

sentences.en: But in real life young men who hoped for this denouement were apt to be disappointed.
sentences.cn: 但是在现实生活中,满心期望这种结局的年轻人,往往会大失所望.

sentences.en: Cowperwood was in no way pleased by this rough denouement.
sentences.cn: 这样草草收场,柯帕乌绝不会高兴的.

sentences.en: In a surprising denouement, she becomes a nun.
sentences.cn: 结局出人意表, 她当修女了.

sentences.en: Such an irregular denouement piques heated discussions among critics and readers as well.
sentences.cn: 这一詹姆斯式弃绝行为引起了读者和评论界的广泛探讨.

sentences.en: The book's sentimental denouement is pure Hollywood.
sentences.cn: 该书的煽情结局纯粹是好莱坞式的。

sentences.en: The plot takes us to Paris for the denouement of the story.
sentences.cn: 故事的情节把我们带到巴黎，迎来大结局。

sentences.en: Yet there are many dramatists who , after a good Complication, fail in the Denouement.
sentences.cn: 现在, 在是否具有相同的结和解而不是情节的基础上,说这出悲剧与那出悲剧相同是可能的.

trans.tran_en: the exciting last part of a story or play
